mapper.select: select id, name, dep, position from member m, memberPosition mp where m.pno=mp.pno order by id desc
select id, name, dep, position, manager, tel, phone from member m, memberPosition mp where m.pno=mp.pno and id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into member(id, pw, name, dep, pno, manager, tel, phone) values(#{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{dep}, #{pno}, #{manager}, #{tel}, #{phone})
mapper.update: update member set tel=#{tel}, phone=#{phone} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select id, name, pno, (select count(*) from message where rdate is null and receiver=#{id}) msgCnt from member where id=#{id} and pw=#{pw}
